reviewText: Not that great. The video lessons that come with the latest version of Garageband (for free) are better than this DVD. Not very easy to follow along with. I can find better stuff online for free... Good thing I only paid $6 on here...

i have this dvd & found it to be a must have for any beginner guitarist wether you want to play the blues or not. john mcarthy gives some good tips and sound advice aswell as being a good teacher. i recommend. i would have given it a 5 star but i think it is a tad too pricey.

I own this and many other Rockhouse Method dvds but this is by far my favorite-I love Blues guitar and this dvd teaches you everything you need to play the blues-Riffs,turnarounds, and backing tracks to play along with. Its gives you everything except the Feeling you put into it yourself!
